Job Description: As a Full Stack Software Developer, you will be involved in building business solutions by creating new and modifying existing software applications.  You will have the opportunity to accumulate essential developmental knowledge by designing, coding, debugging, testing, documenting, and supporting all types of applications consistent with company specifications and requirements to ensure ideal efficiency.As our Full Stack Software Developer, you will Adapt to ever-changing technologies and create optimal contemporary product solutionsConvert wire-frame designs to front-end codeContribute to a unique and exciting project that brings a new user experience to our      flagship softwareRender complex software concepts in ways that can be understood by clients and      customersCreate, organize, and maintain Applications/SystemsSkills and Experience needed for this position:Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, MIS or equivalentApplication development experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript and JavaExperience with SOAP and REST APIsExperience with Spring Framework preferredExperience with Object Oriented Programming Experience with database design and data migration techniquesExperience developing enterprise software applications in an n-tier architectureExperience with cloud platforms; Microsoft Azure preferredExperience with Microsoft SQL Server preferredExperience developing multi-threaded applicationsExperience with Dev/Ops tools, Containerization and web servers Tomcat and Docker      preferredAlso great if you have experience with: Experience with CI /CD systems such as Jenkins Exposure to Elastic infrastructure solutions and deployment (Docker, OpenShift, etc.) Good understanding of NoSQL and its data modeling Solid Exposure to distributed technologies (Kafka, Hadoop, Elasticsearch) Understanding of MDM and MQ technologies Experience in the healthcare industry Bootstrap 3/4, JSON
